title: Project Controls
subject: Effective project controls ensure success by balancing oversight with project complexity, optimizing resources to achieve desired outcomes efficiently.
description:
Successful projects begin when proper planning and procedures are implemented systematically.

Project complexity, organizational maturity, team experience, budget, and other factors determine the level of project controls needed. Excessive control can cause project costs to spiral upward and divert resources from more important tasks. Lax control can lead to delays, errors, political repercussions, and diminished project quality.

As your agent, we provide the project controls tools and techniques to proactively control costs, schedules, and scope of work to reach the desired outcome.

Our project controls services include the following:

title: Construction Claims
subject: We resolve construction disputes with expert claims analysis and management, ensuring optimal outcomes through experience and hands-on support.
description:
We provide solutions to your construction disputes.

Our claims group comprises foremost experts in analyzing complex claims and disputes that originate on construction and engineering projects.

When construction disputes or delays occur, stakes are high. Retaining competent construction experts to resolve those disputes significantly improves your outcome. Our experts have a wealth of experience in identifying, analyzing, preparing, and presenting claims and disputes on construction and engineering projects. Our hands-on experience has consistently proven invaluable to clients requiring expert advice or after-the-fact analyses of disputes and claims.

Our claims services include the following:

title: Project Risk Management
subject: Our risk assessment experts enhance project success by identifying, analyzing, and mitigating potential delays and disruptions efficiently.
description:
Our risk assessment experts prevent or mitigate costly potential delays and disruptions.

While components of project management – scope management, change management, and cost/schedule controls – are effective individually, an integrated risk management process is essential for successful project execution.

A well-defined and integrated risk management process maximizes value through judicious use of time and money. BCL risk management specialists identify and evaluate project risks, manage risk registers, facilitate qualitative risk assessments, conduct quantitative risk analyses, and develop risk mitigation strategies.

In conjunction with project stakeholders, we develop qualitative risk assessments; integrate those assessments into robust, quantitative cost and schedule risk analyses; and monitor and mitigate risks accordingly.
